function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation and outdoor air circulation","Impact":"Increased risk of viral spread through poor air quality","Mitigation":"Regularly opening outer windows and increasing outdoor air through ventilation systems","Technologies":"Ventilation systems, inverter controlled airflow, removal of automatic control of outdoor air","People":"Building occupants, especially in large buildings","Owner":"Building management, HVAC system operators"},{"Description":"Use of in-duct UV-C devices and ozone-emitting devices","Impact":"Potential exposure to hazardous byproducts in occupied spaces","Mitigation":"Using in-duct UV-C devices for decontaminating recirculated air only, avoiding ozone-emitting devices in occupied spaces","Technologies":"In-duct UV-C devices","People":"Building occupants","Owner":"HVAC system operators, maintenance personnel"},{"Description":"Improper operation of HVAC systems and maintenance of pressure differentials","Impact":"Risk of viral load not being effectively diluted in the building","Mitigation":"Properly maintaining and operating HVAC systems, maintaining pressure differentials between zones","Technologies":"HVAC system monitoring technology","People":"Building occupants, especially in large buildings","Owner":"Building management, HVAC system operators"}]}
